children.text: Through local and collaborative storytelling, we seek to inspire solutions and interrupt cycles of gun violence.

Nearly every person in the U.S. will know someone who has been shot in their lifetime.
 
Everyone has a story to tell.

slides.quote: I lost a loved one to gun violence.
